Title: NEW
Body:
Your Site request was received. Your site is currently under review for approval.
Once your site is approved you will be notified through email and receive a link to your site when it is created
Subject: Site Request was received

Title: APPROVED
Body:
Your Site request was approved.
You will be notified once your site is created and will receive a link to your new site.
Subject: Site Request was Approved

Title: REJECTED
Body:
Your Site Request was rejected. Please see Rejector's comments below.
Request site again at dvagov.sharepoint.com/sites/siteprovisioning with remediated items.
Subject: Site Request was Rejected

Title: COMPLETED
Body:
Your Site request was completed.
Visit your site at:
Subject: Site is Created

Title: ERROR
Body:
Your Site request has failed.
Check the log files created during the specified time frame to view the errors and remediate.
Subject: ERROR: Site request has failed
